translations.hero-subtitle-1: Your partner for fast and secure transport
translations.hero-subtitle-3: A dedicated team to meet your needs
translations.services-subtitle: Logistics solutions designed for your success.
translations.service-land-desc: Optimized regional network for your needs.
translations.about-philosophy-subtitle: The principles that guide our every move.
translations.about-mission-desc: Connecting the world with innovative logistics solutions.
translations.about-vision-desc: Redefining logistics through technology and sustainability.
translations.about-commitment-desc: Ensuring excellence and reliability at every step.
translations.about-timeline-2019-desc: Foundation of GKS Logistics in Bamako. Created in 2019, GKS Logistics is a company that operates in the field of transport and logistics with the necessary skills and experience to acquire the market.
translations.about-timeline-2020-desc: Expansion in West Africa. In 2020, it received the award for the best logistics company due to its experience and expertise and its ambitions to conquer the national and international territory.
translations.about-timeline-2025-desc: GKS Logistics is present worldwide in more than 15 countries, with a strong presence in West Africa, as well as in Europe, North America and the Middle East. Thanks to our international network, we offer integrated, reliable and flexible logistics solutions, adapted to the specific needs of each market.
translations.presence-mali-desc: Comprehensive logistics services for your local operations.
translations.presence-turkey-desc: Dynamic connections between Africa and Asia.
translations.presence-guinea-desc: Reliable logistics services in West Africa.
translations.presence-dubai-desc: Dubai is an essential transit point for international trade.
translations.testimonials-subtitle: Discover why our clients trust us for their logistics needs
translations.testimonial-1: GKS Logistics has transformed our supply chain with reliable and fast deliveries.
translations.testimonial-2: Impeccable service and simplified customs procedures. A trusted partner.
translations.testimonial-3: Respect for deadlines and goods in perfect condition. I highly recommend.
translations.contact-subtitle: Connect with our team for customized logistics solutions.

translations.form-message: Describe your needs or any other relevant information.

chatbotResponses.response: Hello! Welcome to GKS Logistics. How can I assist you today?
GKS Logistics is a global logistics company founded in 2019 in Bamako, Mali. We specialize in transport and logistics, offering air freight, sea freight, land transport, and warehousing services.
GKS Logistics was founded in 2019 in Bamako, Mali.
Our mission is to connect the world with innovative logistics solutions.
Our vision is to redefine logistics through technology and sustainability.
We are committed to ensuring excellence and reliability at every step.
In 2020, GKS Logistics received the award for the best logistics company due to our experience and expertise.
GKS Logistics offers air freight, sea freight, land transport, and warehousing services tailored to your needs.
Our air freight service ensures fast and secure international deliveries with 98% on-time performance.
Sea freight is cost-effective for large cargo, with 95% efficiency.
Our land transport service provides an optimized regional network with 97% coverage.
We offer modern and secure warehousing solutions with 99% security.
GKS Logistics operates in over 15 countries, including Mali, Turkey, France, USA, Dubai, Côte d'Ivoire, Guinea, Burkina Faso, and Niger.
In Mali, we provide comprehensive logistics services for local operations. Contact us at sales@gkslogistics.com.
In Turkey, we offer dynamic connections between Africa and Asia. Reach us at sales@gkslogistics.com.
In France, we provide advanced logistics solutions for Europe. Email us at paris@gkslogistics.com.
In the USA, we have a robust network for international trade. Contact us at sales@gkslogistics.com.
In Côte d'Ivoire, our logistics are tailored to regional needs. Email salesabidjan@gkslogistics.com.
In Guinea, we offer reliable logistics services. Contact us at sales@gkslogistics.com.
In Burkina Faso, we provide logistics solutions for regional trade. Email sales@gkslogistics.com.
In Niger, we offer logistics services in West Africa. Contact salesniger@gkslogistics.com.
In Dubai, we provide logistics services as a key transit point. Contact mohamed.keita@gkslogistics.com.
You can contact GKS Logistics at sales@gkslogistics.com or call +223 90929273.
Explore career opportunities at GKS Logistics on our Careers page: careers.html.
Subscribe to our newsletter in the footer to stay updated on GKS Logistics news.
Use the navigation menu to explore Services, About, Case Studies, Careers, News, and Contact sections.
To track your shipment, contact our team at sales@gkslogistics.com with your shipment details.
We offer customs clearance services to simplify international shipping. Contact us for details.

FCL (Full Container Load) means you book a full container for your cargo. LCL (Less than Container Load) means you share container space with other shippers, which is more cost-effective for smaller shipments.
Yes, we offer specialized temperature-controlled logistics (cold chain) for sensitive goods like pharmaceuticals and perishables. Our solutions ensure product integrity from origin to destination.
We handle dangerous goods transportation with full compliance to international regulations. Our certified team ensures safe handling and documentation for hazardous materials.
We provide comprehensive cargo insurance options to protect your shipments. Our insurance partners offer competitive rates and full coverage for international transport.
We offer professional packaging services to ensure your goods are properly protected during transit. Our team uses industry-standard materials and techniques.
Our team of experts handles the entire customs clearance process, including documentation, duties, and compliance, to ensure your shipments cross borders smoothly and without delay.
Our headquarters is located in Bamako, Mali. We have a modern facility with state-of-the-art equipment and a team of logistics professionals ready to serve you.
